The greatest war is confirmed in episode 3. It’s give me a hope that Battle of the two queens is coming. 
I was dreaming about...
body:
The greatest war is confirmed in episode 3. It’s give me a hope that Battle of the two queens is coming.

I was dreaming about that during years

Two the most greatest queen of seven kingdom will fight each other.😍😍😍 this will be amazing👌🏿👌🏿👌🏿mother of dragons and mad queen😍😍😍

“Madness And Greatnesses is two side of the same coin. “

Season 8 will end up wirh battle of the queens👑👑👑❤️❤️❤️

Congratulations everyone 😍😍😍

blog.description:
Naomi | She/Her | 24 | 🌞♉️| 🌜♑️| INFP | Hobbyist & Freelancer | Movie-Buff | Loves Critical Role, DnD, Tolkien, Game of Thrones| Gryffindor| TARGARYEN LOYALIST| This is my art blog! Sometimes I post original drawings, but this is all mostly fanart.
Please do NOT use, repost/copy/reproduce/trace, color, edit, publish, or distribute my art!

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary: I wanted to post a side-by-side comparison of these drawings, because they had started out as companion drawings that I wanted...
caption: I wanted to post a side-by-side comparison of these drawings, because they had started out as companion drawings that I wanted to post together from the very beginning but couldn’t, due to my motherboard failure preventing me from finishing Dany for over 9 months. It’s super interesting to me how they both started off as sketches and the way they ultimately ended up as illustrations!

reblog.comment: I wanted to post a side-by-side comparison of these drawings, because they had started out as companion drawings that I wanted to post together from the very beginning but couldn’t, due to my motherboard failure preventing me from finishing Dany for over 9 months. It’s super interesting to me how they both started off as sketches and the way they ultimately ended up as illustrations!

trail.content_raw: I wanted to post a side-by-side comparison of these drawings, because they had started out as companion drawings that I wanted to post together from the very beginning but couldn’t, due to my motherboard failure preventing me from finishing Dany for over 9 months. It’s super interesting to me how they both started off as sketches and the way they ultimately ended up as illustrations!
trail.content: I wanted to post a side-by-side comparison of these drawings, because they had started out as companion drawings that I wanted to post together from the very beginning but couldn’t, due to my motherboard failure preventing me from finishing Dany for over 9 months. It’s super interesting to me how they both started off as sketches and the way they ultimately ended up as illustrations!

tags: all the gifts make me so happyyy
summary: I'm just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking him to love her
title: I'm just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking him to love her
body:
Mini-gift for @winterfellslady mostly because I couldn’t pick for which of your favorite ships to write.

The one where it’s Daenerys knocking on Jon’s door instead of the other way round. A canon divergence drabble/mini-fic based on the season finale of Game of Thrones season 7.

Daenerys took a deep breath and straightened her dress once more. She had hoped that he would come to her, pledging more than just his loyalty to her, but if he was even contemplating it, he was taking his time. Too much time. 

They were only a few days away from White Harbor, his kingdom, his territory. 

And considering the part the Starks and the North had played in the downfall of her brother, she didn’t doubt they wouldn’t exactly be welcoming towards her. Not unless she would have the undoubting support of their King. 

King Jon.

She could see why his people had crowned him, what they had seen in him. She understood why they put their faith in him and wanted him to lead them in the big war that was to come. She wanted him by her side for just that same reason.

He was brave and thought about the greater good before he thought about himself. The safety of his people, his kingdom, his sister, all came long before his own needs. He didn’t want or need power. He didn’t want the crown his people had placed on his head. He was simply bearing and wearing it because it was his only chance to get the army he needed to fight the death coming closer and closer to the wall and Westeros. 

She left her own quarters and accompanied by the weak light of a dozen candles she made her way to Jon’s room, not that far away from hers. Her heart was racing in her chest and the palms of her hands were sweating.

No matter how often she tried to convince herself that this was merely a political alliance, she knew what she felt was not political at all. It was something she had never thought to feel again, not after everything she had lost and not after what she had become. 

She hesitated one more second and then she knocked firmly on his wooden door. 

The seconds ticking by seemed to last minutes or even hours and her mind presented her each and every worst case scenario she had tried not to think about.

What if he would betray her? What if he would arrange for her to get killed in the North upon arrival? What if he was sending letters and ravens to instruct his people to bring her down? To eliminate the treat she was?

But why would he do that? He needed her army. He needed the Dothraki, the Unsullied and all those loyal to her. And they would not follow him when his people would kill her.

She took another deep breath.

Of course there was also the chance he didn’t feel what she felt, didn’t want what she wanted. Maybe he would frown his eyes when he saw her, standing here in front of his door at this unholy time. Maybe he would send her away, politely as only Jon Snow could do, not knowing that by doing so he would break her barely healed heart.

The door squeaked when he opened it, the long travel clearly hearable, and she looked up at Jon Snow, wearing nothing but his pants and a white shirt, all of a sudden not knowing what to say. 

But it seemed that words weren’t need to tell him what she wanted. Their eyes met and reluctantly she curled a hand around his neck and leaned towards him. She gave him the time to pull back, to gently push her away, but he didn’t do so.

Instead he leaned in and his warm breath touched her nose before he gently kissed her slightly parted lips. His hands wandered over her back, lower and lower, pulling her dress up and up until his hands touched nothing but her naked skin. 

She used her body to guide him towards his bed while her lips never lost touch with his. A burning heat spread through her veins and she opened her mouth to allow their tongues to meet and play. Her hands pulled his white shirt over his head and she fought the urge to do this quickly, to give in to the fire claiming her completely. She wanted to enjoy this. She wanted to do this slowly and tenderly and lovingly. And she wanted it to last. As long as possible, until their ship would reach White Harbor and then night after night again.

summary:
*Jon and Rickon have locked themselves in a closet to escape Sansa*
Sansa: Come out of their right now!
Jon: No!
*Sansa huffs...
body:
*Jon and Rickon have locked themselves in a closet to escape Sansa*

Sansa: Come out of their right now!

Jon: No!

*Sansa huffs and walks away*

Jon: *to Rickon* Guess I showed her who’s boss in this family.

summary:
Jonsas  Think about scripts 
Think about it
Think about it
Think about it
All night long....
And finally decided
This scripts...
title:
Jonsas  Think about scripts 
Think about it
Think about it
Think about it
All night long....
And finally decided
This scripts are fake 
congratulation my dear Jonsas 
Your hysteria is already there
There is nothing more sweet  than your desperation

summary: I kind of can’t believe people still think that Kit saying that Jon manipulates people in a “very kind, very Jon Snow way” = Jon...
body:
I kind of can’t believe people still think that Kit saying that Jon manipulates people in a “very kind, very Jon Snow way” = Jon emotionally and sexually manipulating and using a woman.

That’s.. kind? On what planet?

It also conveniently disregards Kit actually speaking of Jon’s feelings for her.

reblog.comment:
I kind of can’t believe people still think that Kit saying that Jon manipulates people in a “very kind, very Jon Snow way” = Jon emotionally and sexually manipulating and using a woman.

That’s.. kind? On what planet?

It also conveniently disregards Kit actually speaking of Jon’s feelings for her.

summary: EDIT: This has been in my draft for ages and it's killing me! I don't remember writing it! My own cliffhanger is killing me!! ...
body:
EDIT: This has been in my draft for ages and it’s killing me! I don’t remember writing it! My own cliffhanger is killing me!! Where was I going with this? It’s haunting me!

“Just thought about a thing… Jonmund AU where Tormund is part of the local biker gang "the Wildlings” and Jon just moved in the city and started to work at a tattoo parlor (The Crow, the Inkwatch or something idk). His first very big work is on Tormund and they have to do it in several sessions, but it’s Jon that insists on it cause he starts cramping after a while and it’s the safe and health eay to do it (it’s something on his back or two sleeves or neck and below idk). Tormund brags like “pffft we can do it in one day I’m not feeling anything” but Jon’s answer is a deapan “no, now get out”. Jon thinks Tormund is always like that and mostly yeah he is, but he’s also actually trying to impress Jon because he’s cute.

He ends up slipping Jon his number ‘in case he wants to see his finished and healed up work’. Jon probably calls back for a drink or something but he’s really guarded because Tornund is a lot to deal with.

Then all the Wildlings have some charity"

Some charity what??? Damn!

body:
About those scripts…

Hey Jonsa fam, just to calm things down a little, do you really think they would show a script saying “Jon pretends to be in love with Daenerys and gives her what she wants so he can make her come North and forget about the throne?”

Nah…Very curious that they show this now that we see many articles doubting the supposed romance between these two, many articles saying what we’ve been saying for a year now !

Please don’t doubt what we saw and don’t believe what they trying to tell you. Tell but don’t show, remember ?

And please, please don’t forget Jonsa fam’s amazing and intelligent metas because they are making sense! We are not delusional !!

If Kit Harington did not know when exactly Jon was supposed to fall in love with D or that Jon manipulates people in a very kind, Jon Snow way…I mean, come on!! Everything is here!!

And please, please, don’t forget Bryan Cogman!!

Stay strong fam!

blog.name: jackoshadows
blog.title: Jak O' the Shadows
blog.description: I’m not going to swear an oath I can’t uphold. Talk about my father if you want. Tell me that’s the attitude that got him killed. But when enough people make false promises, words stop meaning anything. Then there are no more answers - only better and better lies. And lies won’t help us in this fight - Jon Snow.

summary: As expected, all the ‘Kit Harington is the worst actor’ rants have already started on Twitter and Tumblr with the release of...
body:
As expected, all the ‘Kit Harington is the worst actor’ rants have already started on Twitter and Tumblr with the release of info from the scripts…

Jon Snow fans, be prepared for a deluge of ‘Jon is the worst, stupid, fool traitor who deserves to be stabbed to death a hundred times by the Northern lords’ type of posts from now on as it dawns on a certain section of fans that Jon is never, ever going to shag Sansa and make her queen.

I can understand attacks on the character. But the actor? Ugh. Jonsa fandom continues to be terrible and toxic. What’s new right?

blog.name: cbrownjc
blog.title: Thoughts and Reflections
blog.description:
Tumblr for posting my thoughts, reflections and other stuff pertaining to various things and interests in my life.
Fandoms: Smallville, Buffy, Angel, Harry Potter, Lord of the Rings, The Hobbit, Fullmetal Alchemist, The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya, ASOIAF/GOT, The Legend of Zelda, Video Games, DC Comics, Anime, Manga, Broadway, Musicals.

tags: A Song of Ice and Fire
summary: I actually hope D&D don’t get too much blame for the “Tyrion is in love with Dany” thing the Vanity Fair article confirmed from...
body:
I actually hope D&D don’t get too much blame for the “Tyrion is in love with Dany” thing the Vanity Fair article confirmed from the Season 6 and Season 7 scripts. Because I don’t think that is their doing at all. I think that is straight up a George R. R. Martin thing full stop, and it’s going to happen in the books too.

GRRMs original outline for the series had Tyrion falling in love with Arya - and it being unrequited - leading to a Jon / Arya / Tyrion love triangle. It seems clear to me that GRRM changed it to now have Dany in Arya’s place instead. (BTW, I don’t think it was a late-change either. I think it was something he figured out and changed during the writing of the first book).

Honestly, I’m becoming more and more convinced that, though some things got expanded and some things/characters got changed around a bit, the bigger, overall points from Martin’s outline are still in play. The core five characters he mentioned in the original outline (Dany, Tyrion, Bran, Arya and Jon) are still the same core five characters in the book AND on the show. (Some of the more recent promos, especially the recap ones, have those five in them all the time, and sometimes in highlighted ways).

And whatever Martin’s endgame is for the books (if he ever finishes them)? Will be the same for the show. The thing about Tyrion is starting to convince me that, no matter the turns they took with some characters vs their book counterparts, (or whitewashing out the darker shades of grey when it comes to some of these characters), the show versions are going to moved into their book counterparts positions (whatever they are supposed to be) for the endgame.

Possible S8 Spoilers Below! Read at your own risk.

So yeah, I read the spoiler about Tyrion betraying the Starks, being put on trial and being executed for it. And while I’m not sure on the why or what when it comes to the betrayal part of the spoiler, I think there will be one of some sort, and Tyrion will be executed for it. 

GRRMs original notes said the love triangle will turn deadly between Jon and Tyrion. And I think that will what is in play/going on/being set up on the show at the moment.

The audience accepting it will be an entirely other thing however. Taking out some of Tyrion’s darker moments from the book will likely make it a really bitter pill to swallow for a lot of people I’m sure.
